long_description: A tiny camera stand for on-the-go fun, the Joby GPod Mini magnetic tripod allows easy setup and stability on most surfaces, all in a tiny design that packs up quickly for just about any adventure. Lightweight legs fold together for easy carrying; flexible joints adapt to uneven surfaces to stabilize your camera. Magnetic feet let you use it on metal objects such as a metal railing or auto body. Flexible neck allows you to adjust the position of the camera angle. Tried and true durable Gorillapod materials allow the Joby GPod Mini magnetic tripod to support up to seven times its weight.
short_description: A tiny camera stand for on-the-go fun, the Joby GPod Mini magnetic tripod allows easy setup and stability on most surfaces, all in a tiny design that packs up quickly for just about any adventure.
